text: David Oyetokunbo Oyelowo (born 1 April 1976) is a British actor, director and producer. He portrayed Louis Gaines in Lee Daniels' 2013 movie The Butler. He also provided the voice of Scar in The Lion Guard. ==Life== Oyelowo lives in Los Angeles, California. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Oxford Category:British movie actors Category:British stage actors Category:British television actors Category:British voice actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States
title: David Oyelowo
